text: niṅṅaḷkk nāṁ mēghattaṇal nalkukayuṁ mannāyuṁ kāṭapakṣikaḷuṁ iṟakkittarikayuṁ ceytu. niṅṅaḷkk nāṁ nalkiyiṭṭuḷḷa viśiṣṭamāya vastukkaḷil ninn bhakṣiccukeāḷḷuka (enn nāṁ nirdēśiccu). avar (enniṭṭuṁ nandikēṭ kāṇiccavar) namukkeāru drēāhavuṁ varuttiyiṭṭilla. avar avarkk tanneyāṇ drēāhamuṇṭākkikkeāṇṭirikkunnat‌
